Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Merge RoConsole and project-chat into unified interface

Major changes:
- Created unified index.html combining ALL features from RoConsole and project-chat
- Added project selector dropdown to header with full project context support
- Updated all navigation links (scripts.html, projects.html) to point to unified interface
- Added automatic redirects from roconsole.html and project-chat.html to index.html
- Preserved all features: Explorer panel, auto-send to Roblox, script viewer, project mode
- Chat.js already had full project support built-in - no changes needed

The unified interface is now the default, accessible at /index.html
Legacy URLs automatically redirect to preserve backwards compatibility
